code: import axios from'axios';const BASE_URL='https://685013d7e7c42cfd17974a33.mockapi.io';export const api=axios.create({baseURL:BASE_URL});export const taxesAPI={getAll:()=>api.get('/taxes'),getById:id=>api.get("/taxes/".concat(id)),update:(id,data)=>api.put("/taxes/".concat(id),data),create:data=>api.post('/taxes',data),delete:id=>api.delete("/taxes/".concat(id))};export const countriesAPI={getAll:()=>api.get('/countries')};
